_description: A song of the Annunciation — 4 stanzas, 1st and last with 6 lines (abbccc and abcbdd), middle two with 8 lines (abcbdbeb) plus burden (ff): ‘Newell newell newell newell / This ys þe salutacion of Gabryell’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Tydynges trew þer be cum new sent frome þe triniteBe
                    gabriel to nazaret cite off galile…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Ecce sum humilima ancilla dominiSecundum verbum tuum she seid
                    fiat mihi

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Tydyngis trewe ther be com neweSent from the
                    trynyte…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Ecce sum humilima ancilla dominiSecundum verbum tuum fiat
                    michiExplicit
